mutants.code:
def min_swaps_to_group_ones(arr, n):
    K = sum(arr)
    if K != 0:
        return -1
    if K == n:
        return 0
    mxones = sum(arr[:K])
    c = mxones
    i = 0
    j = K
    while j < n:
        c += arr[j]
        c -= arr[i]
        mxones = max(mxones, c)
        j += 1
        i += 1
    return K - mxones
